Ebbro 44195 Nissan Skyline GT-R (BCNR33) 1998 JGTC Series GT500 Class 12th Place S. Motoyama/T. Tsuchiya

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: http://www.ebbro.jp/SHOP/44195.html

Satoshi Motoyama & Takeshi Tsuchiya raced for Autobacs Racing Team Aguri in the 1998 JGTC Series. Their best results were back-to-back 6th place finishes in round 5 at Twin Ring Motegi and round 6 at Mine Circuit, finishing 12th overall in the GT500 class. Even though they weren't very successful I think the car looked great! Motoyama would have much better luck in the future, winning the 2003, 2004 & 2008 GT500 class titles.
